nodes.text: The Coxixian Prayer for the Departed was a prayer that was included in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of writings on the Force edited by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
The Coxixian Prayer for the Departed first appeared as a chapter quote in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
